channel.title: Search before you post
channel.description:
Well i've seen a lot of doubled threads.
I suggest to you all that you SEARCH the section before posting.
Your question has most likely already been answered.

item.title: Search before you post
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

I suggest keeping this to yourself, this kind of thing only gets you banned, and/or muted. There is also no point in doing this because it will grab 2-3 peoples attention, and the rest will continue to ask.

Read full topic
